module.name: @MODULE_NAME@
module.author: Maros Cunderlik
module.description: Synchronize data between a parent and multiple child servers

privilege.name: View Synchronization Status
privilege.description: Enables one to see the status of the synchronization process

privilege.name: View Synchronization Records
privilege.description: Enables one to see the synchronization record data

privilege.name: Manage Synchronization
privilege.description: Enables one to do administrative duties for the synchronization module

globalProperty.description: Display name for this server, to distinguish it from other servers.
Email address for administrator responsible for this server.
If true, enables the use of the STARTTLS command (if supported by the server) to switch the connection to a TLS-protected connection before issuing any login commands. Defaults to false.
Server role for the synchronization scheduled task login.
Number of times to try to retry automatic synchronization before giving up.
Number of sync items to be shown per page.
Number of records to package up and send at a time via the web.
Number of records to package up and send at a time via a file.
Timeout before sync process gives up trying to connect to parent server. If null, sync default formula is used. Units are milliseconds (remember, 6000 represents a minute).
The role for the users to receive alerts generated when the Sync module sends out an email
Comma separated list of exceptions that will not cause an increment of the retryCount on sync records. (exact matches on class names only, no child classes matched)

The template used to generate new users' system_id on this server. Available options: {SYNCSERVERNAME}, {SYNCSERVERUUID}, {NEXTUSERID}, {CHECKDIGIT}. Empty string will use core's built-in algorithm (warning: this WILL produce duplicate system ids if user generation is done on multiple servers. Use empty string with caution)
Boolean value indicating whether or not create a transmission log in .OpenMRS/sync/recrd folder. Available options: true,false
Boolean value indicating whether or not create a backup file of the cloned database in .OpenMRS/sync folder. Available options: true,false
Boolean value indicating wheter allow the use of self-signed certificates in https connections. Available options:true,false

module.mappingFiles: SyncClass.hbm.xml SyncImportRecord.hbm.xml SyncRecord.hbm.xml SyncServer.hbm.xml SyncServerClass.hbm.xml SyncServerRecord.hbm.xml
